SEARCH
Package com.mycompany.main

Class CarefulPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.main.Player
com.mycompany.main.CarefulPlayer
public class CarefulPlayer extends Player
The CarefulPlayer class represents a player in the board game who plays with a cautious strategy. This player will evaluate properties before making any transactions, ensuring they maintain a balance above a certain threshold before making purchases.

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public void playTurn(int diceRoll, List<Field> board)
      Executes the player's turn based on the result of a dice roll. This method moves the player to the new position based on the dice roll.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Player
      Parameters:
      diceRoll - the result of the dice roll
      board - the list of fields on the game board

    • handleFieldInteraction

      protected void handleFieldInteraction(Field field)
      Handles the interaction of the player with the field they land on. This method contains logic for interacting with property fields and executing actions based on the state of the field.
      Specified by:
      handleFieldInteraction in class Player
      Parameters:
      field - the field that the player lands on
